title: 148 - Alabama Beach Angel
description:
Tim gives the gang an anthropological lesson on why females converse more than their male counterparts. Livy comes down with a horrible case of carrot chest (it’s serious). Heather tells the story of the nine hawks. The gang goes down memory lane with the long history of Hawkins Houses and their eclectic basements.  Luke does his best to grow facial hair among his lumberjack brothers. 
Big thanks to our sponsors for this episode!
